sn1.33:4.2: Then, late at night, several beautiful gods of the Satullapa Group, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha,
sn1.33:4.3: bowed, and stood to one side.
sn1.33:4.4: Standing to one side, one deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:6.1: Then another deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:7.2: Even when one has little, giving is good.
sn1.33:8.1: Some who have little are happy to provide,
sn1.33:8.2: while some who have much don’t wish to give.
sn1.33:9.1: Then another deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:10.2: Even when one has little, giving is good.
sn1.33:10.3: And it’s also good to give out of faith.
sn1.33:10.4: Giving and warfare are similar, they say,
sn1.33:10.5: for even a few of the good may conquer the many.
sn1.33:10.6: If a faithful person gives even a little,
sn1.33:10.7: it still brings them happiness in the hereafter.”
sn1.33:11.1: Then another deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:12.2: Even when one has little, giving is good.
sn1.33:12.3: And it’s also good to give out of faith.
sn1.33:12.4: And it’s also good to give legitimate wealth.
sn1.33:13.1: A man who gives legitimate wealth,
sn1.33:13.2: earned by his efforts and initiative,
sn1.33:13.3: has passed over Yama’s Vetaraṇi River;
sn1.33:13.4: that mortal arrives at celestial fields.”
sn1.33:14.1: Then another deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:15.2: Even when one has little, giving is good.
sn1.33:15.3: And it’s also good to give out of faith.
sn1.33:15.4: And it’s also good to give legitimate wealth.
sn1.33:15.5: And it’s also good to give intelligently.
sn1.33:16.1: The Holy One praises giving intelligently
sn1.33:16.2: to those worthy of offerings here in the world of the living.
sn1.33:16.3: What’s given to these is very fruitful,
sn1.33:16.4: like seeds sown in a fertile field.”
sn1.33:17.1: Then another deity uttered this aphorism in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.33:18.2: Even when one has little, giving is good.
sn1.33:18.3: And it’s also good to give out of faith.
sn1.33:18.4: And it’s also good to give legitimate wealth.
sn1.33:18.5: And it’s also good to give intelligently.
sn1.33:18.6: And it’s also good to be restrained when it comes to living creatures.
sn1.33:19.1: One who lives without harming any living creature
sn1.33:19.2: never does bad because of others’ blame;
sn1.33:19.3: for in that case they praise the coward, not the brave;
sn1.33:19.4: and the virtuous never do bad out of fear.”
sn1.33:20.1: Then another deity said to the Buddha:
sn1.33:21.1: “You’ve all spoken well in your own way. However, listen to me also:
sn1.33:22.1: It’s true that giving is praised in many ways
sn1.33:22.2: but the path of the teaching is better than giving,
sn1.33:22.3: for in days old and older still,
sn1.33:22.4: the wise and virtuous even attained extinction.”
